settings.title: Settings
settings.fallAsleepDesc: How many minutes does it take to fall asleep?

calculator.goToBedNowDesc: If I sleep now, when should i get up?
calculator.whenToWakeUpDesc: Find the perfect time to wake up.
calculator.whenToGoToBedDesc: Find the perfect time to go to bed.
calculator.takePowerNapDesc: Improve your productivity, your focus, and simply enjoy the feeling!

welcome.slide1Title:
Elevate Your Sleep Quality:
Get Started with Sleepwell!
welcome.slide1Desc: Sleepwell is an open-source sleep cycle app. Determine optimal wake-up, sleep, and nap times. Explore customizable alarms and progress reports for better sleep.
welcome.slide2Title:
Enjoy Restful Sleep
with Sleepwell Features
welcome.slide2Desc: Sleepwell helps create and track personalized sleep schedules. Experience healthier sleep with customizable alarms, insightful reports, and user-friendly design.
welcome.slide3Title:
Sleepwell: Calculating and
Tracking Sleep Cycles
welcome.slide3Desc: Sleepwell analyzes sleep cycles and suggests personalized timings using advanced algorithms. Sleep better with optimized wake-up and rest times.
welcome.slide4Title:
Join the Sleepwell Community:
Collaborate for Better Sleep
welcome.slide4Desc: Sleepwell fosters a community experience. Contribute on GitHub and other platforms. Download Sleepwell for improved sleep quality and collaborative progress.

reports.title: Reports
reports.noMoreSleeps:

reports.noSleeps:

info.title: Informations
info.healthNoticeDesc: Sleepwell cannot be associated with healthcare professionals and not gives recommendations.
